overview:
Istvan is the CTO and co-founder of Bee-novator.

He graduated at the Budapest University of Technology and Economics in 2005 as a technical IT specialist. Already in his academic years he develops softwares at several software development companies. He participates in various business projects in the field of banking, military, education, telecomm and energy. Within the last 5 years he works as a developer regarding it as his primary task to understand the clientâ€™s way of thinking, the business environment and problem in each of his projects to be able fully satisfy the target users. He believes, it is only possible to develop a good software if the developer becomes an expert himself in the given business field as well. He is sharing this way of thinking, too in his blog (http://infokukac.com). Besides project works, he mentors his direct colleagues as well. He has won 2nd place twice at the International Olympiad of Informatics (1997. Cape Town, South-Africa, 1998. SetÃºbal, Portugal) as part of the Hungarian team of four. Besides his work, he studies acting, dubbing and sings in a chorus.
